summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1858, for the improvement of James Street, in the City of Seattle, from Third Avenue to Fourth Avenue, by paving the same with stone blocks laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing brick gutters, granite curbs and concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 19418. and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
